page.title: 18POSTAL SERVICES
page.content: Postal services avialable to the estate consist of two post boxes, three post men and a sub post office. There are regular deliveries and collections to and from the post boxes and sub post office. Residents on the estate have a choice of three different milk companies; those those run by the co_operative, Unigate and a self owned business. The floats deliver other products to sell on the estate. the three companies deliver every day. There are two telephone boxes situated outside the Mayfield Road, and another in Southwood Road. On the London Road there are two petrol stations, one with an adjoining car showroom.
